EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_7AM Con-Driven Contracts Microservice Arch_Q416.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: 10/25 Webinar - Consumer-Driven Contracts and Your Microservice Architecture
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, You are receiving this email because you registered for today's webinar Consumer-Driven Contracts and Your Microservice Architecture.
Please see event details below:
Date: Tuesday, October 25, 2016 Time: 7:00AM PDT
Join the Session <[[http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1284602/7A2DF01D43256BD128A74E889CF5365E]]>
Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers.
We look forward to you joining us!
